statements: DELETE FROM costume_inventory WHERE color = 'Red' AND quantity < 10;
DELETE FROM costume_inventory WHERE costume_id = 101 AND color = 'Red';
DELETE FROM costume_inventory WHERE quantity < 10 AND last_alteration_date >= '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM costume_orders WHERE order_id = 100 AND costume_id = 5;
DELETE FROM alterations WHERE costume_id = 10 AND alteration_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM Inventory WHERE location = 'Warehouse A' AND quantity <= 10;
